channel.title: Signal Processing, BCI on Pranavi Boyalakuntla
channel.description: Recent content in Signal Processing, BCI on Pranavi Boyalakuntla

item.title: BCI Spatial Filtering Algorithms
item.description: As a part of my topics in bioengineering class, I took a deep dive into problems with EEG based brain computer interfaces. A huge issue is the artifacts that are created and lower than ideal spatial resolution. I researched ICA, CSP, and other spatial filters. (Full Paper)
